1{-# LANGUAGE RecordWildCards #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Parameter specification.
6
7module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Para.ParaSpec
8  ( -- * Specification
9    -- ** ParaSpec
10    ParaSpec (..),
11    paraSpecNames,
12    paraSpecNamesP, paraSpecNamesN,
13    -- ** ParaSpecPos
14    ParaSpecPos (..),
15    paraMinLength,
16
17    -- * Unmatch reason
18    ParaUnmatch (..), paraMatch, 
19    ParaTo, paraSelect, paraChoose,
20
21    -- * Construction
22    ParaSpecMap, paraSpec,
23    -- ** Positional
24    paraMin, paraMax, paraJust, paraRange,
25    -- ** Named positional
26    para0, para1, para2, para3,
27    paraItem, paraItemOpt, paraItemRest,
28    -- ** Required / Optional
29    paraReq, paraOpt,
30    -- ** Multiple-occurence
31    paraFirst, paraLast, paraMulti,
32  ) where
33
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture          as O
35import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base              as B
36import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Para.Para  as S
37
38
39-- --------------------------------------------  Specification
40
41-- ----------------------  ParaSpec
42
43-- | Parameter specification.
44data ParaSpec n
45    = ParaSpec
46      { paraSpecPos    :: ParaSpecPos n -- ^ Positional parameter
47      , paraSpecReqP   :: [n]  -- ^ Positional required parameters
48      , paraSpecOptP   :: [n]  -- ^ Positional optional parameters
49      , paraSpecReqN   :: [n]  -- ^ Explicitly-named required parameters
50      , paraSpecOptN   :: [n]  -- ^ Explicitly-named optional parameters
51      , paraSpecFirst  :: [n]  -- ^ Allow multiple-occurence, use first parameters
52      , paraSpecLast   :: [n]  -- ^ Allow multiple-occurence, use last parameters
53      , paraSpecMulti  :: [n]  -- ^ Allow multiple-occurence, use all parameters
54      } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
55
56-- | No parameters
57instance B.Default (ParaSpec n) where
58    def = ParaSpec { paraSpecPos     = ParaRange 0 0
59                   , paraSpecReqP    = []
60                   , paraSpecOptP    = []
61                   , paraSpecReqN    = []
62                   , paraSpecOptN    = []
63                   , paraSpecFirst   = []
64                   , paraSpecLast    = []
65                   , paraSpecMulti   = [] }
66
67instance Functor ParaSpec where
68    fmap f spec@ParaSpec {..} =
69        spec { paraSpecPos   = fmap f paraSpecPos
70             , paraSpecReqP  = fmap f paraSpecReqP
71             , paraSpecOptP  = fmap f paraSpecOptP
72             , paraSpecReqN  = fmap f paraSpecReqN
73             , paraSpecOptN  = fmap f paraSpecOptN
74             , paraSpecFirst = fmap f paraSpecFirst
75             , paraSpecLast  = fmap f paraSpecLast
76             , paraSpecMulti = fmap f paraSpecMulti }
77
78-- | Name list of all parameters.
79paraSpecNames :: ParaSpec n -> [n]
80paraSpecNames spec = paraSpecNamesP spec ++ paraSpecNamesN spec
81
82-- | Name list of positional parameters.
83paraSpecNamesP :: ParaSpec n -> [n]
84paraSpecNamesP ParaSpec {..} = paraSpecReqP ++ paraSpecOptP
85
86-- | Name list of explicitly-named parameters.
87paraSpecNamesN :: ParaSpec n -> [n]
88paraSpecNamesN ParaSpec {..} = paraSpecReqN ++ paraSpecOptN
89
90-- ----------------------  ParaSpecPos
91
92-- | Positional parameter specification.
93data ParaSpecPos n
94    = ParaItem     Int [n]      -- ^ Named positional parameters
95    | ParaItemOpt  Int [n] [n]  -- ^ Named positional and optional parameters
96    | ParaItemRest Int [n] n    -- ^ Named positional and rest parameters
97    | ParaMin   Int             -- ^ Lower bound of parameter length
98    | ParaRange Int Int         -- ^ Lower and upper bound of parameter length
99      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
100
101instance Functor ParaSpecPos where
102    fmap f (ParaItem     a ns)      = ParaItem     a (fmap f ns)
103    fmap f (ParaItemOpt  a ns opt)  = ParaItemOpt  a (fmap f ns) (fmap f opt)
104    fmap f (ParaItemRest a ns rest) = ParaItemRest a (fmap f ns) (f rest)
105    fmap _ (ParaMin a)              = ParaMin a
106    fmap _ (ParaRange a b)          = ParaRange a b
107
108-- | Minimal length of positional parameters.
109paraMinLength :: ParaSpecPos n -> Int
110paraMinLength (ParaItem     a _)    = a
111paraMinLength (ParaItemOpt  a _ _)  = a
112paraMinLength (ParaItemRest a _ _)  = a
113paraMinLength (ParaMin      a)      = a
114paraMinLength (ParaRange    a _)    = a
115
116
117-- --------------------------------------------  Unmatch
118
119-- | Unmatch reason of real parameter and its specifition.
120data ParaUnmatch n
121    = ParaOutOfRange Int (ParaSpecPos n) -- ^ Positional parameter is unmatched.
122    | ParaUnknown  [n]    -- ^ Unknown parameter is specified.
123    | ParaMissing  [n]    -- ^ Required parameter is missing.
124    | ParaMultiple [n]    -- ^ Parameter occurs more than once.
125      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
126
127instance Functor ParaUnmatch where
128    fmap f (ParaOutOfRange a pos) = ParaOutOfRange a (fmap f pos)
129    fmap f (ParaUnknown  ns)      = ParaUnknown      (fmap f ns)
130    fmap f (ParaMissing  ns)      = ParaMissing      (fmap f ns)
131    fmap f (ParaMultiple ns)      = ParaMultiple     (fmap f ns)
132
133-- | Test and revise parameter to satisfy specification.
134
135paraMatch :: (Eq n, Ord n) => ParaSpec n -> S.Para n a -> Either (ParaUnmatch n) (S.Para n a)
136paraMatch spec p =
137    case paraMatchPos spec p of
138      Left u   -> Left u
139      Right p' -> paraMatchNamed spec $ paraReviseNamed spec p'
140
141paraMatchPos :: (Ord n) => ParaSpec n -> S.Para n a -> Either (ParaUnmatch n) (S.Para n a)
142paraMatchPos spec p = m pos where
143    m (ParaItem a ns)        | l == a      = Right $ paraAdd ns ps p
144    m (ParaItemOpt a ns opt) | l == a      = Right $ paraAdd ns ps p
145                             | l > a && l <= a + length opt
146                                           = Right $ paraAdd (ns ++ opt) ps p
147    m (ParaItemRest a ns n)  | l >= a      = Right $ paraAddRest ns n ps p
148    m (ParaMin a)            | l >= a      = Right p
149    m (ParaRange a b)  | l >= a && l <= b  = Right p
150    m _                                    = Left $ ParaOutOfRange l pos
151
152    pos = paraSpecPos spec
153    ps  = S.paraPos p
154    l   = length ps
155
156paraAdd :: (Ord n) => [n] -> [a] -> S.Para n a -> S.Para n a
157paraAdd (n:ns) (x:xs) p = paraAdd ns xs $ S.paraNameAdd n [x] p
158paraAdd [] _ p = p
159paraAdd _ [] p = p
160
161paraAddRest :: (Ord n) => [n] -> n -> [a] -> S.Para n a -> S.Para n a
162paraAddRest nns rest xxs = loop nns xxs where
163    loop (n:ns) (x:xs) p = loop ns xs $ S.paraNameAdd n [x] p
164    loop [] xs p = S.paraNameAdd rest xs p
165    loop _ [] p = p
166
167paraReviseNamed :: (Ord n) => ParaSpec n -> S.Para n a -> S.Para n a
168paraReviseNamed ParaSpec {..} p = p3 where
169    p2 = foldr S.paraTakeFirst p paraSpecFirst
170    p3 = foldr S.paraTakeLast p2 paraSpecLast
171
172paraMatchNamed :: (Eq n) => ParaSpec n -> S.Para n a -> Either (ParaUnmatch n) (S.Para n a)
173paraMatchNamed spec@ParaSpec {..} p
174    | unknowns  /= []  = Left $ ParaUnknown  unknowns
175    | missings  /= []  = Left $ ParaMissing  missings
176    | multiples /= []  = Left $ ParaMultiple multiples
177    | otherwise        = Right p
178    where
179      ns          = S.paraNames p
180      ns2         = S.paraMultipleNames p
181      total       = paraSpecNames spec
182      unknowns    = ns B.\\ total
183      missings    = paraSpecReqN B.\\ ns
184      multiples   = ns2 B.\\ paraSpecMulti
185
186-- | Map parameter to some value.
187type ParaTo n a b = S.Para n a -> b
188
189-- | Select matched specification and apply 'ParaTo' function.
190paraSelect :: (Eq n, Ord n) => b -> [(ParaSpec n, ParaTo n a b)] -> ParaTo n a b
191paraSelect b specs p = loop specs where
192    loop [] = b
193    loop ((spec, paraTo) : specs2) =
194        case paraMatch spec p of
195          Right p' -> paraTo p'
196          Left _   -> loop specs2
197
198paraChoose :: (Ord n) => [(Maybe String, ParaSpec n)] -> S.Para n a -> Either [ParaUnmatch n] (S.Para n a)
199paraChoose specs p = loop [] specs where
200    loop us [] = Left $ reverse us
201    loop us ((tag, spec) : rest) =
202        case paraMatch spec p of
203          Left u    -> loop (u:us) rest
204          Right p'  -> case tag of
205                         Nothing -> Right p'
206                         Just t  -> Right $ p' { S.paraTags = t : S.paraTags p' }
207
208
209-- --------------------------------------------  Construct
210
211type ParaSpecMap n = O.Map (ParaSpec n)
212
213paraSpec :: (Show n, Ord n) => ParaSpecMap n -> ParaSpec n
214paraSpec edit = paraCheck $ edit B.def
215
216paraCheck :: (Show n, Ord n) => ParaSpecMap n
217paraCheck spec@ParaSpec {..}
218    | null dup   = spec
219    | otherwise  = B.bug $ "duplicate para names: " ++ show dup
220    where dup    = B.duplicates $ paraSpecNames spec
221
222-- ----------------------  Positional
223
224-- | Lower bound of length of positional parameter.
225--
226-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraMin 1
227-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a b"
228-- Right Para ...
229-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen ""
230-- Left ParaOutOfRange ...
231paraMin :: Int -> ParaSpecMap n
232
233-- | Upper bound of length of positional parameter.
234--
235-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraMax 1
236-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a"
237-- Right Para ...
238-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a b"
239-- Left ParaOutOfRange ...
240paraMax :: Int -> ParaSpecMap n
241
242-- | Fixed-length positional parameter.
243--
244-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraJust 1
245-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a"
246-- Right Para ...
247-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen ""
248-- Left ParaOutOfRange ...
249paraJust :: Int -> ParaSpecMap n
250
251-- | Lower and upper bound of length of positional parameter.
252--
253-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraRange 1 2
254-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a"
255-- Right Para ...
256-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a b c"
257-- Left ParaOutOfRange ...
258paraRange :: Int -> Int -> ParaSpecMap n
259
260paraMin   n   = paraPos $ ParaMin   n
261paraMax   n   = paraPos $ ParaRange 0 n
262paraJust  n   = paraPos $ ParaRange n n
263paraRange m n = paraPos $ ParaRange m n
264
265paraPos :: ParaSpecPos n -> ParaSpecMap n
266paraPos pos spec = spec { paraSpecPos = pos }
267
268-- ----------------------  Named positonal
269
270-- | No positional parameter.
271para0 :: ParaSpecMap n
272-- | Named one positional parameter.
273para1 :: n -> ParaSpecMap n
274-- | Named two positional parameters.
275para2 :: n -> n -> ParaSpecMap n
276-- | Named three positional parameters.
277para3 :: n -> n -> n -> ParaSpecMap n
278
279para0         = paraItem []
280para1 a       = paraItem [a]
281para2 a b     = paraItem [a,b]
282para3 a b c   = paraItem [a,b,c]
283
284-- | Named arbitrary positional parameters.
285--
286-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraItem ["x", "y", "z", "w"]
287-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a b c d"
288-- Right (Para { ..., paraName = fromList [("x",[["a"]]), ..., ("w",[["d"]])] })
289paraItem :: [n] -> ParaSpecMap n
290paraItem ns spec@ParaSpec {..} =
291    spec { paraSpecPos  = ParaItem (length ns) ns
292         , paraSpecReqP = ns ++ paraSpecReqP }
293
294-- | Named arbitrary and one optional parameters.
295--
296-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraItemOpt ["x", "y"] ["z"]
297-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a b"
298-- Right (Para { ..., paraName = fromList [("x",[["a"]]),("y",[["b"]])] })
299-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a b c"
300-- Right (Para { ..., paraName = fromList [("x",[["a"]]),("y",[["b"]]),("z",[["c"]])] })
301paraItemOpt :: [n] -> [n] -> ParaSpecMap n
302paraItemOpt ns opt spec@ParaSpec {..} =
303    spec { paraSpecPos  = ParaItemOpt (length ns) ns opt
304         , paraSpecReqP = ns ++ paraSpecReqP
305         , paraSpecOptP = opt ++ paraSpecOptP }
306
307-- | Named arbitrary and one optional parameters.
308--
309-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraItemRest ["x", "y"] "z"
310-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "a b c d"
311-- Right (Para { ..., paraName = fromList [("x",[["a"]]),("y",[["b"]]),("z",[["c","d"]])] })
312paraItemRest :: [n] -> n -> ParaSpecMap n
313paraItemRest ns n spec@ParaSpec {..} =
314    spec { paraSpecPos    = ParaItemRest (length ns) ns n
315         , paraSpecReqP = ns ++ paraSpecReqP
316         , paraSpecOptP = n : paraSpecOptP }
317
318
319-- ----------------------  Required/optional
320
321-- | Required named parameter.
322--
323-- >>> let p = S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "-x a -y b"
324-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraReq ["x"]
325-- >>> paraMatch s p
326-- Left (ParaUnknown ["y"])
327paraReq :: [n] -> ParaSpecMap n
328
329-- | Optional named parameter.
330--
331-- >>> let p = S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "-x a -y b"
332-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraReq ["x"] . paraOpt ["y"]
333-- >>> paraMatch s p
334-- Right (Para { ..., paraName = fromList [("x", [["a"]]), ("y", [["b"]])] })
335paraOpt :: [n] -> ParaSpecMap n
336
337-- ----------------------  Multiple-occurence
338
339-- | Allow multiple-occurence and use first parameter.
340--
341-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraReq ["x"] . paraFirst ["x"]
342-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "-x a -x b c"
343-- Right (Para { ..., paraName = fromList [("x", [["a"]])] })
344paraFirst :: [n] -> ParaSpecMap n
345
346-- | Allow multiple-occurence and use last parameter.
347--
348-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraReq ["x"] . paraLast ["x"]
349-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "-x a -x b c"
350-- Right (Para { ..., paraName = fromList [("x", [["b","c"]])] })
351paraLast :: [n] -> ParaSpecMap n
352
353-- | Multiple-occurence parameter.
354--
355-- >>> let s = paraSpec $ paraReq ["x"] . paraMulti ["x"]
356-- >>> paraMatch s $ S.paraWords S.paraHyphen "-x a -x b c"
357-- Right (Para { ..., paraName = fromList [("x", [["a"],["b","c"]])] })
358paraMulti :: [n] -> ParaSpecMap n
359
360paraReq   ns spec  = spec { paraSpecReqN   = ns }
361paraOpt   ns spec  = spec { paraSpecOptN   = ns }
362paraFirst ns spec  = spec { paraSpecFirst  = ns }
363paraLast  ns spec  = spec { paraSpecLast   = ns }
364paraMulti ns spec  = spec { paraSpecMulti  = ns }
365
